title: In the Dead of Night
description: The investigation into the murder of a prominent couple on their Nebraska farm is upended after the discovery of a small, gold ring at the crime scene. Keith Morrison has chosen this episode as one of his most memorable classic episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
